sentences.en: Do not for repulse forget the purpose that you resolved to offer.
sentences.cn: 不要只因一次挫败,就放弃你原来决心想达到的目标.

sentences.en: Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effeet.
sentences.cn: 不要因为一次的失败, 就放弃自己原来决定要达到的目的.

sentences.en: Do not, for repulse, forgo the purpose you resolved to effort.
sentences.cn: 不要因为你一次的挫折就放弃你原来决心要达到的目标.

sentences.en: Do not, for repulse, forgot the purpose that you resolved to effort.
sentences.cn: 不要只因一次挫败,就放弃你原来想达到的目的.

sentences.en: Don't for one repulse, forgot the purpose that you resolved to effect.
sentences.cn: 不要只因一次挫败,就放弃你原来决心要达到的目的.

sentences.en: Government troops repulsed an attack by rebel forces.
sentences.cn: 政府军击退了叛军的攻击。

sentences.en: He moves to Zheng Yuling after Hong Kong Repulse Bay's mansion, lives in here.
sentences.cn: 他搬离郑裕玲在香港浅水湾的豪宅后, 就住在这里.
她的拒绝是完全出人意料的.

sentences.en: Her request for a donation met with a repulse.
sentences.cn: 她要求赞助却遭到粗暴拒绝.

sentences.en: Repulse Bay Lang Ping Sha small beach - wide, gentle slope, the water warm.
sentences.cn: 浅水湾浪平沙细,滩床宽阔, 坡度平缓, 海水温暖.

sentences.en: The armed forces were prepared to repulse any attacks.
sentences.cn: 武装部队已作好击退任何进攻的准备。

sentences.en: The enemy met with a repulse.
The long repulse , at first restrained and secret, was at last opened.
sentences.cn: 多年来, 原来被他克制着的、暗藏的愤恨终于揭开了.

sentences.en: The very thought of his cold clammy hands repulsed me.
sentences.cn: 一想到他那双冷冰冰、黏糊糊的手，我就感到恶心。

sentences.en: This is Shek - O back beach not Repulse Bay. Please correct.
sentences.cn: 这是石澳后滩、不是浅水湾. 请更改.

sentences.en: When they saw him repulse society, they said, " He is a brute. "
sentences.cn: 现在,他谢绝社交, 大家说: “ 那是个莽汉. ”
你为什么给我钉子碰 哪 ?
